meanings.meaning: not say, hear, etc. a dicky bird

vlive.korean: 한 마디? Say one thing? 듣기 View video DIA : [DIA] 다이아는 지금 대구!
한마디였어 - 뭐? It was a word. - What? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 🍯💧즈 왔어용~☔️
"사나야 콘서트에 갈 수는 없지만 가고 싶은 원스에게 한마디 해 줄래?" "SANA, although we can't go to a concert, can you say something for ONCE who want to go to a concert"? 듣기 View video TWICE : 오랜만이에요🌙💜
vlive.english: "SANA, although we can't go to a concert, can you say something for ONCE who want to go to a concert"?

vlive.korean: 마지막으로 팬들에게 한 마디? Will you say something to fans? 듣기 View video Red Velvet : Red Velvet - IRENE & SEULGI 'Monster' 반말 인터뷰
vlive.english: Will you say something to fans?

vlive.korean: [마지막 한마디] - 네? - 갑자기요? [Last words] - What? - So suddenly? 듣기 View video EXO : EXO-SC 세훈&찬열 '10억뷰' 인터뷰 with 개코 (Ơ3Ơ)👍🏻 (⊼⌔⊼)👍🏻

examples.korean: She enunciated each word slowly and carefully. 발음듣기 그녀는 말 한 마디 한 마디를 천천히 신중하게 발음했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She enunciated each word slowly and carefully. 발음

examples.korean: four beats to the bar 발음듣기 한 마디에 네 박자 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: four beats to the bar 발음

examples.korean: Reporters took down every word of his speech. 발음듣기 기자들은 그의 연설 한 마디 한 마디를 기록했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Reporters took down every word of his speech. 발음

examples.korean: Each word was freighted with anger. 발음듣기 말 한마디 한마디에 분노가 실려 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Each word was freighted with anger. 발음

examples.korean: He never breathed a word of this to me. 발음듣기 그는 이것에 대해 내게 한마디도 하지 않았다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He never breathed a word of this to me. 발음
